chat.title: Data Query & Analysis
chat.welcome: Welcome to QueryGPT Intelligent Data Analysis System
chat.feature3: Intelligently analyze data and provide insights
chat.example1: Show sales data for the last month
chat.example2: Analyze sales distribution by product category
chat.example3: Find top 10 customers by sales amount
chat.hint: Tip: Enter natural language queries, and the system will automatically convert them to SQL and generate charts
chat.needChart: Need a chart? Try explicitly requesting "generate chart" or "visualize data" in your query

onboarding.step1Content: Your intelligent data analysis assistant. Let me show you around.
onboarding.step2Content: Type your question here, e.g. "show sales for the last 30 days".
onboarding.step3Content: Click here or press Enter to send.
onboarding.step4Content: Choose different AI models for best results.
onboarding.step6Content: Configure database and other options here.
onboarding.confirmSkipMessage:
Are you sure you want to skip?
You can restart it later from Help.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.contextDesc: Set how many conversation rounds AI remembers for error correction and context understanding
settings.smartRoutingDesc: Use AI to intelligently determine query types and automatically select optimal execution paths, significantly improving response speed for simple queries

database.title: MySQL Database Configuration
database.compatibility: Compatible with all MySQL protocol databases: OLAP (Doris, StarRocks, ClickHouse), NewSQL (TiDB, OceanBase)
database.hint: Hint: Leave empty to enable cross-database queries, use database.table format

prompts.title: Prompt Settings
prompts.description: Customize prompts used by the query module to adjust AI behavior for your business needs.
prompts.tip1: Modifying prompts helps AI better understand your business scenario
prompts.tip2: Recommend backing up current config before making changes
prompts.tip3: Reset will restore all prompts to system defaults
prompts.tip4: Support import/export for easy migration between environments
prompts.saveFailed: Failed to save, please try again
prompts.resetFailed: Failed to reset, please try again
prompts.importFailed: Import failed, please check file format

about.title: About System

licenseDetails.openInterpreterDesc: Open source natural language code execution engine, allows commercial use
licenseDetails.openInterpreterDetail1: • This project uses pip installed version 0.4.3, follows MIT license
licenseDetails.openInterpreterDetail2: • Free to use, modify and deploy
licenseDetails.openInterpreterDetail3: • Provides core AI capabilities for natural language to code
licenseDetails.otherLibsDesc: Allows commercial use, modification and distribution
licenseDetails.flaskDetail: • Flask 3.1.1 - Lightweight web framework, BSD license
licenseDetails.pymysqlDetail: • PyMySQL 1.1.1 - MySQL database connection library, MIT license
licenseDetails.plotlyDetail: • Plotly 6.3.0 - Data visualization library, MIT license
licenseDetails.allOpenSource: • All dependencies are open source licensed
licenseDetails.disclaimerText: This system is an AI-powered tool. The developer is not responsible for any data loss or other issues that may occur during use. Please backup your data and manage permissions before use.

about.systemDesc: This system is developed based on open source components, using MIT license:
about.freeUse: Free to use, modify, and distribute

history.title: History
history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.

common.continuousTip: Supports continuous conversation, you can continue asking based on previous results
common.dataMining: Data mining in progress, please wait...

tips.detailed: The more detailed the description, the more accurate the query
tips.naturalLanguage: Supports natural language queries, like "last month's sales"
tips.flexibleTime: Flexible time descriptions: this week, last quarter, Q3 2024 all work
tips.autoChart: Query results will automatically generate charts
tips.continuous: Supports continuous conversation, ask follow-up questions based on results
tips.comparison: Try comparison analysis: "Compare this year with last year"
tips.examples: Examples: "Top 10 sales this month" or "East region revenue"
tips.trend: Analyze trends: "Sales trend for last 6 months"
tips.followUp: Follow up with: "Group by month" or "Add year-over-year"
tips.tabKey: Press Tab to quickly switch input fields
tips.lateNight1: It's late, take a rest after this query~
tips.lateNight2: Early morning hours, remember to protect your eyes
tips.lateNight3: Working late, remember to take breaks
tips.lateNight4: Still working so late, you're really dedicated!
tips.lateNight5: Night owl mode activated, but health is more important
tips.midnight: Past midnight, rest early for your health
tips.earlyMorning: Early morning, health is more important than data

errors.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later
errors.generalError: An error occurred, please try again

notifications.requestFailed: Request processing failed. Check network connection or try again later.

warnings.dbUnavailable: Database connection failed. Please configure the connection or try again later.
warnings.dbWarningDesc: The assistant cannot reach the database, so this action has been paused.
warnings.dbAutoDismiss: This notice will auto hide in
warnings.dbForce: Bypassing the guard and continuing without a valid database connection…

query.noChartGenerated: No visualization chart generated for this query

tips.notSatisfied: Not satisfied? Try adding details and providing feedback to AI again
tips.errorOccurred: Encountered an error? Try simplifying query conditions or check if table names are correct
tips.notPrecise: Query not precise enough? Try specifying specific time ranges or data dimensions
